#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

void solve()
{
	int N, temp, can, flag = 0, x, y, z;
	int max1, max2, max_can = 0;
	scanf("%d",&N);
	scanf("%d %d %d",&x, &y, &z);
	temp = x * 100 + y * 10 + z;
	
	for(int i = 1; i <= 9; i++)
	{
		for(int j = 0; j <= 9; j++)
		{
		
			can = i * 10000 + temp * 10 + j;
			
			if(can % N == 0)
			{
				flag = 1;
				if(can > max_can)
				{
					max_can = can;
					max1 = i;
					max2 = j;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	if(flag)
		printf("%d %d %d\n",max1, max2, max_can / N);
	else
		printf("0\n");
	return;
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
		solve();
	return 0;
}
